mapper.select: SELECT menu_id ,menu_name ,menu_create_user ,menu_create_dttm ,menu_modify_user ,menu_modify_dttm ,menu_auth ,menu_info ,menu_url ,menu_level ,menu_depth1 ,menu_depth2 ,menu_depth3 FROM menu WHERE menu_auth LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menu_auth}, '%') ORDER BY menu_depth1, menu_depth2, menu_depth3

SELECT menu_id ,menu_name ,menu_create_user ,menu_create_dttm ,menu_modify_user ,menu_modify_dttm ,menu_auth ,menu_info ,menu_url ,menu_level ,menu_depth1 ,menu_depth2 ,menu_depth3 FROM menu ORDER BY menu_depth1, menu_depth2, menu_depth3
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(menu_id), 0) + 1 AS next_menu_id FROM menu

SELECT menu_id ,menu_name ,menu_create_user ,menu_create_dttm ,menu_modify_user ,menu_modify_dttm ,menu_auth ,menu_info ,menu_url ,menu_level ,menu_depth1 ,menu_depth2 ,menu_depth3 FROM menu WHERE menu_id = #{menu_id}
